title: Beta-alanine metabolism
description: β-Alanine (or beta-alanine) is a naturally occurring beta amino acid. This pathway described the pyrimidine catabolism of cytosine and uracil as sources for β-Alanine.  Pathway adapted from KEGG beta-alanine pathway (https://www.genome.jp/kegg-bin/show_pathway?mtc00410).
